name: Blightmoore - Indie Student Project
description:
Blightmoore is a 2D/3D Side Scrolling puzzle/platforming game that takes place in the fictional city of Blightmoore.

This is a small Uni Project game that was made featuring some small mechanic systems & a rich Gothic/Victorian environment. This was made as a sort of proof-of-concept for a bigger game involving the city of Blightmoore and its inhabitants.

Mac version coming soon.
